column1: Fig. 3.2018 streamflow and stream level and <s>3</s>H
activities  in  waters  from  the  riparian  zones  and
streams  in  the  Banool  (a)  and  McGill  (b)  catch-
ples from elsewhere along the streams and circle
symbols are the Plantation stream water samples.
The yellow bar indicates the range of <s>3</s>H activities
in  regional  groundwater  (data  from  Table  S1).
The shaded band represents estimated <s>3</s>H activ-
ities of present-day rainfall (2.6 to 3.0 TU: Tadros
et al., 2014) and the dashed line is the measured
<s>3</s>H value of local rainfall. Data from Table S1.
(For interpretation of the references to colour in
